about.title: About the Conference
paragraph: In the era of globalization, where compliance with international standards is becoming a crucial condition for success in global markets, the organization of specialized events like the International Conference "Quality Assurance in Compliance with International Standards in Turkmenistan" gains particular importance.
On April 29-30, participants will gather in Ashgabat on a unique platform to discuss key trends in product certification and labelling, exchange experiences, and implement best practices.

offers.title: Hotels; Transfers; Visas
offers.text: For inquiries regarding hotel accommodation, visa support, transportation, and tour services, please refer to the travel guide.
